hero.title: The Operating System for Valet Parking Companies.
hero.subtitle: Digitize your operation, eliminate cash fraud, and reduce delivery times by 40%. Total control from your phone.

solutions.title: The Complete Solution for Valet Parking
solutions.subtitle: Control every aspect of your operation from a centralized platform
solutions.card1Description: Automatic cash closing and real-time auditing. Eliminate cash fraud and gain full visibility of your revenue.
solutions.card2Description: Photographic damage registry and valet tracking. Protect your customers and reduce claims with digital evidence.
solutions.card3Description: Digital tickets via SMS/WhatsApp. Reduce operational costs and offer a modern experience to your customers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple 3-step process that transforms your operation
howItWorks.step1Description: The valet receives the car, takes photos of its condition, and sends a digital ticket to the customer via SMS or WhatsApp.
howItWorks.step2Description: The customer requests their vehicle and pays from their phone. The manager receives the notification in real-time.
howItWorks.step3Description: The manager assigns the order to the available valet. The valet receives the location and delivers the car in record time.
